metadata.description: Specifies the name of the Azure Machine Learning workspace which will hold this datastore target.
The name of the datastore, case insensitive, can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscore
The name of the storage account.
The name of the file share.
Optional : A storage account key, defaults to None. Skip this if SAS token authentication is used.
Optional : An account SAS token, defaults to None. Skip this if storage account key authentication is used.
Optional : The endpoint of the storage account. Defaults to core.windows.net
Optional : Protocol to use to connect to the blob container. If not specified, defaults to https.
Optional : If set to true, the call will skip Datastore validation. Defaults to false
The location of the Azure Machine Learning Workspace.
